con:settings.con:setting: <xml-fragment xmlns:con="http://eviware.com/soapui/config"> <con:entry key="DataServiceVersion" value="2.0"/> <con:entry key="x-csrf-token" value="Fetch"/> <con:entry key="Host" value="${#Project#Prop_Project_Host}"/> <con:entry key="Content-Type" value="application/json"/> </xml-fragment>

con:testCase.name: S0000315119 Logon
con:testCase.con:description: TestCase generated for REST Resource [] located at [/rm-cloud-web/]

con:config.script:
def projectUrl = [ "dev": "https://supportshell-waeb84638.dispatcher.int.sap.hana.ondemand.com/", "qual": "https://supportshell-wb0ceb360.dispatcher.int.sap.hana.ondemand.com/", "test": "https://supportshell-wd9bf76ae.dispatcher.int.sap.hana.ondemand.com/", "prod": "https://launchpad.support.sap.com/" ]
def projectHost = [ "dev": "supportshell-waeb84638.dispatcher.int.sap.hana.ondemand.com", "qual": "supportshell-wb0ceb360.dispatcher.int.sap.hana.ondemand.com", "test": "supportshell-wd9bf76ae.dispatcher.int.sap.hana.ondemand.com", "prod": "launchpad.support.sap.com" ]
def system = testRunner.testCase.project.getPropertyValue("Prop_Project_System").toLowerCase()
testRunner.testCase.project.setPropertyValue("Prop_Project_Url",projectUrl[system]) testRunner.testCase.project.setPropertyValue("Prop_Project_Host",projectHost[system])

con:testStep.name: copy saml data
con:testStep.con:description: Get the value of input element with the name "SAMLRequest" from the step "SAML2 AuthLauncher". Store it in SOAP UI's testCase saml_request property.

con:settings.con:setting: <xml-fragment xmlns:con="http://eviware.com/soapui/config"> <con:entry key="DataServiceVersion" value="2.0"/> <con:entry key="x-csrf-token" value="Fetch"/> <con:entry key="Host" value="${#Project#Prop_Project_Host}"/> <con:entry key="Content-Type" value="application/json"/> </xml-fragment>

<xml-fragment xmlns:con="http://eviware.com/soapui/config"> <con:entry key="DataServiceVersion" value="2.0"/> <con:entry key="x-csrf-token" value="Fetch"/> <con:entry key="Host" value="${#Project#Prop_Project_Host}"/> <con:entry key="Content-Type" value="application/json"/> </xml-fragment>

con:configuration.scriptText:
def testCase = context.getTestCase() def response = messageExchange.responseContent def root = new XmlSlurper().parseText(response) def day = root.entry[0].content.properties.eudp_date
Date date = new Date() String today = date.format("yyyyMMdd")
Date onemonth = date + 30 String planday = onemonth.format("yyyyMMdd") log.info(planday)
assert day == planday

con:settings.con:setting: <xml-fragment xmlns:con="http://eviware.com/soapui/config"> <con:entry key="DataServiceVersion" value="2.0"/> <con:entry key="x-csrf-token" value="Fetch"/> <con:entry key="Host" value="${#Project#Prop_Project_Host}"/> <con:entry key="Content-Type" value="application/json"/> </xml-fragment>

con:configuration.scriptText:
def testCase = context.getTestCase() def response = messageExchange.responseContent def root = new XmlSlurper().parseText(response) def day = root.entry[0].content.properties.eudp_date
Date date = new Date() String today = date.format("yyyyMMdd")
Date onemonth = date + 30 String planday = onemonth.format("yyyyMMdd") log.info(planday)
assert day == ""
